Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small ImplicationZroupoid Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small ImplicationZroupoid AllSmallImplicationZroupoid is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic implicationzroupoid models from orders 2 to 5.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of ImplicationZroupoid formulas(ImplicationZroupoid).
a(x) = x*0.
(x*y)*z = a((a(z)*x) * (a(y*z))).
a(a(0)) = 0.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
